entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve default value handling in RDG #51241
  • Perf regression: json #51239
  • Perf improvement: updates #51238
  • [Blazor] Page created in Client project is not discovered from URL in .NET 8 RC1 #51237
  • [Blazor] Hot Reload not working properly when using RenderModeAuto in .NET 8 RC1 #51236
  • BlazorWebView needs a way to enable overriding ResolveComponentForRenderMode #51235
    .NET 9 Planning
  • not working httputility #51234
  • RequestDelegateGenerator intercepts incorrect methods #51233
  • Log when an enhanced navigation fails #51229
    .NET 9 Planning
  • NavigationManager.Refresh throws on SSR-only pages #51222
    8.0.0
  • wwwroot DirectoryNotFound #51219
  • Automatically create OpenApiParameters when using BindAsync in Minimal API #51218
  • NavigationManager.Uri does not update for interactive components on non-interactive routers #51216
    8.0.0
  • Failed to log out user with error "Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'classList')" after publishing Blazor Web Individual App #51215
    8.0.0
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json #51214
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #51213

Closed

  • DisableAntiforgery has no effect when applied on RouteGroupBuilder #51194
  • User isn't logged in after registering a new user in a Blazor Web App with Identity #51179
  • Logout fails in Blazor Web App with Identity #51180
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Change onclick action in navigation for default template #51230
  • Enhance Blazor Web .reconnect to state whether failures are due to circuit not existing so we can auto-reload page #50979
    8.0.0
  • Upgrade Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly to support new Polly.Core #51228
  • Rename the "ASP.NET Core Web App" template to "ASP.NET Core Razor Pages App" #50999
    8.0.0
  • Consolidate Blazor Web App terminology: "Interactive render mode" vs "Interactivity type" vs "hosting model" #51108
    8.0.0
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51212

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix disabling anti-forgery check on route groups #51244
    area-networking
  • Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51243
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Defer enhanced component updates until reconnection circuit completes #51242
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure
  • Blazor Web Template Accessibility #51231
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • SignOutHttpResult/SignOutResult ctor overloads that take a single authentication scheme #51220
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • QuickGrid static pagination #51217
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Fix pluralization of 'scheme' in doc comments #51206
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix disabling anti-forgery check on route groups #51232
    area-minimal, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e47544a` to `2dd1c13` #51186
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Sync shared code from runtime #51196
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix handling of default values in RDG #51193
    area-minimal
  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement, area-networking
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution
